General.Name: Jiangsu Chengxing Phosph-Chemical Co Ltd
General.Description: Jiangsu ChengXing Phosph-Chemicals Co., Ltd. produces and sells chemical raw materials and chemical products in China. Its products include yellow phosphorus, phosphoric acid, and phosphate. The company also offers dental, food, pharmaceutical, industrial, and electronic grades phosphorous chemicals, such as sodium dihydrogen phosphate, calcium dihydrogen phosphate, calcium hydrogen phosphate, phosphoric acid, potassium phosphate, sodium tripolyphosphate, monocalcium phosphate, and trisodium phosphate. It also provides petrochemical products. The company was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Jiangyin, China.
